data.message: I am very tired that you starts every single video that has been posted on the wall automatically. Its disturbing and annoying and on my phone it eats up Gigabytes extreamly fast, mostly in vain. Thus I dont want to see vids I havent asked for to see. So can you please change so that I have to activate it to see the vids? Thanks!

replies.message: Hi Johan. We hear your frustration. There is currently no option to disable videos from automatically playing for the desktop version of Facebook, but you can adjust the settings to only automatically play some videos while on WiFi for Facebook Mobile: https://www.facebook.com/help/633446180035470?sr=1&sid=0iMHILbfrl9vhobxU -Hailey
